title: Bamboo Recipe
full_text:
Bamboo Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
dry vermouth
1 1/2
ounces
dry sherry
1 to 2
dashes
bitters
(I prefer Angostura Orange or Regan’s Orange bitters)
Orange twist
, for garnish
Directions
Combine vermouth, sherry, and bitters in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well for 20 seconds, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of orange peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
